events.name: Stop Player (Attack, Block, Hurt, Pause and Game Over)

events.comment: Enemy: Graphical alerts for the player
Player: Graphical alerts for the player

parameters: "Player angle:" + ToString(Player.TopDownMovement::Angle()) + NewLine() + "Player orientation: " + Player.orientation + NewLine() + NewLine() + "Atackking: " + Player.is_atakking + NewLine() + "Blocking: " + Player.is_blocking + NewLine() + NewLine() + "> Current stats" + NewLine() + "HP: " + Player.current.hp + " / " + Player.current.hp_max + " [vigor:" + Player.attributes.vigor + "]" + NewLine() + "Stamina: " + Player.current.stamina + " / " + Player.current.stamina_max + " [endurance:" + Player.attributes.endurance + "]" + NewLine() + "MP: " + Player.current.mp + " / " + Player.current.mp_max + " [mind:" + Player.attributes.mind + "]" + NewLine() + "Damage: " + Player.current.damage + " [strength:" + Player.attributes.strength + "]" + NewLine() + "Magic: " + Player.current.magic + " [Intelligence:" + Player.attributes.intelligence + "]" + NewLine() + "Luck: " + Player.current.rate + " [luck:" + Player.attributes.luck + "]" + NewLine() + "Increase LV: " + increase_attributes + NewLine() + NewLine() + "Breakable Obj" + NewLine() + "Obj: " + Breakable_Obj.ObjectName() + NewLine() + "Life: " + Breakable_Obj.life + " / " + Breakable_Obj.max_life + NewLine() + NewLine() + "Enemy orientation: " + Enemies.Control.orientation + NewLine() + "HP: " + Enemies.Current.hp + NewLine() + "Timer dead: " + Enemies.Control.cooldown_excludeObj + NewLine() + "Speed: " + ToString(Enemies.TopDownMovement::Speed()) + " / " + ToString(Enemies.TopDownMovement::MaxSpeed()) + NewLine() + "Angle: " + ToString(Enemies.TopDownMovement::Angle()) + NewLine() + "x,y (force): (" + ToString(Enemies.ForceX()) + " / " + ToString(Enemies.ForceY()) + ")" + NewLine() + "Combat mode: " + Enemies.Control.combat + NewLine() + "Exit combat in: " + Enemies.Control.cooldown_exitCombat + NewLine() + NewLine() + "Number of Visions: " + ToString(SceneInstancesCount(EnemyVisionArea)) + NewLine() + "Number of enemy: " + ToString(SceneInstancesCount(Enemies))

"HP: "+Player.current.hp+" / "+Player.current.hp_max+NewLine()+
"MP: "+Player.current.mp+" / "+Player.current.mp_max+NewLine()+
"STA: "+Player.current.stamina+" / "+Player.current.stamina_max+NewLine()+NewLine()+
"Is ATK: " + Player.is_atakking + NewLine()+
"Is BLK: " + Player.is_blocking + NewLine()+
"Is alive: " + Player.Is_alive +NewLine()+NewLine()

events.comment: Basics infos aboult the player + Attributes

parameters:
"HP: "+Player.current.hp+" / "+Player.current.hp_max+NewLine()+
"ATK: "+Player.current.damage +NewLine()+NewLine()+
"Is ATK: " + Player.is_atakking + NewLine()+
"Is BLK: " + Player.is_blocking + NewLine()+
"Is alive: " + Player.Is_alive +NewLine()+NewLine()+
"Vigor : " + Player.attributes.vigor +NewLine()+
"Strength : " + Player.attributes.strength +NewLine()

NewLine()      + "XP Boost"                    + NewLine()+
"Current LV: " + Player.LevelUp.LV             + NewLine()+
"XP Current: " + Player.LevelUp.XPCurrent      + NewLine()+
"XP Target : " + Player.LevelUp.XPTarget       + NewLine()+
"ATB Point : " + Player.LevelUp.AttributePoint + NewLine()+
"LevelUP ? : " + increase_level                + NewLine()+
NewLine()

"DeadZone "    + Camera.DeadZone +NewLine()+
"CamDelta X: " + Camera.DeltaX   +NewLine()+
"CamDelta Y: " + Camera.DeltaY   +NewLine()+
"Cam Speed: "  +Camera.Speed     +NewLine()+
"Distance: "   + ToString(sqrt(Camera.DeltaX * Camera.DeltaX + Camera.DeltaY * Camera.DeltaY))+NewLine()

"Enemy orientation: " + Enemies.Control.orientation + NewLine() + "HP: " + Enemies.Current.hp + NewLine() + "Timer dead: " + Enemies.Control.cooldown_excludeObj + NewLine() + "Speed: " + ToString(Enemies.TopDownMovement::Speed()) + " / " + ToString(Enemies.TopDownMovement::MaxSpeed()) + NewLine() + "Angle: " + ToString(Enemies.TopDownMovement::Angle()) + NewLine() + "x,y (force): (" + ToString(Enemies.ForceX()) + " / " + ToString(Enemies.ForceY()) + ")" + NewLine() + "Combat mode: " + Enemies.Control.combat + NewLine() + "Exit combat in: " + Enemies.Control.cooldown_exitCombat + NewLine() + "---------------" + NewLine()

events.comment: Basics infos aboult all enemies in the scene

parameters:
"HP: " + Enemies.Current.hp + NewLine() + "Speed: " + ToString(Enemies.TopDownMovement::Speed()) + " / " + ToString(Enemies.TopDownMovement::MaxSpeed()) + NewLine() + "Is attack: " + Enemies.Control.is_attacking + NewLine() + 
"Cooldown attack: " + ToString(round(Enemies.Control.cooldown_atk*100)/100) + NewLine() + "Combat mode: " + Enemies.Control.combat + NewLine() + "Exit combat in: " + ToString(round(Enemies.Control.cooldown_exitCombat*100)/100) + NewLine() + 
"Knock: " + Enemies.Control.is_knocked+NewLine()+
"Force: "+ ToString(Enemies.ForceLength())+NewLine()+
"Knock timer: " + ToString(Enemies.ObjectTimerElapsedTime("knockcooldown"))+NewLine()

+"---------------" + NewLine()

NewLine()+NewLine()+
"widht msg: "  + ToString(PressKey.Width()) +NewLine()+
"W msg/2: "    + ToString(PressKey.Width()/2) +NewLine()+
"Altar: " + ToString(Altar.Width())+NewLine()+
"Cam Speed: "  +Camera.Speed     +NewLine()+
"Distance: "   + ToString(sqrt(Camera.DeltaX * Camera.DeltaX + Camera.DeltaY * Camera.DeltaY))+NewLine()

NewLine()+NewLine()+
"Timer seconds: " + Cronometro.Seconds +NewLine()+
"Timer minutes: " + Cronometro.Minutes +NewLine()+
"Timer hours  : " + Cronometro.Hours   +NewLine()+
"Timer at log : " + Cronometro.Hours   +
                    Cronometro.Minutes +
                    Cronometro.Seconds

"Run Time: " +RunTime +NewLine()+
"Enemys defeated: " +EnemiesDefeated +NewLine()+ 
"Player Level: " + Player.LevelUp.LV +NewLine()+
"Player Level: NO"

Result +NewLine()+NewLine()+
"__ Press SPACE for play again ___"

"Run Time: " +RunTime +NewLine()+
"Enemys defeated: " +EnemiesDefeated +NewLine() + 
"Player Level: " + Player.LevelUp.LV +NewLine() +
"Boss defeated: YES"

Result +NewLine()+NewLine()+
"__ Press SPACE for play again ___"

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: BehaviorRemapper
description: Make sure to disable default controls unless you want two keys to do the same action.
Actions have two versions. `custom` allow the movement keys to be changed to what ever you would like. `presets` provide a common key-bindings that can be selected from a list.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Remap keyboard controls of the top-down movement.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RemapForTopdown

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Top-Down behavior controls to a custom control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Top-Down controls to a custom scheme
eventsFunctions.name: SetCustom
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remap controls of _PARAM0_: Up: _PARAM2_, Left: _PARAM3_, Down: _PARAM4_, Right: _PARAM5_

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Top-Down behavior controls to a preset control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Top-Down controls to a preset
eventsFunctions.name: SetPreset

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Remap keyboard controls of the platformer character movement.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RemapForPlatformer

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Platformer behavior controls to a custom control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Platformer controls to a custom scheme
eventsFunctions.name: SetCustom
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remap controls of _PARAM0_: Up: _PARAM2_, Left: _PARAM3_, Down: _PARAM4_, Right: _PARAM5_, Jump: _PARAM6_

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Platformer behavior controls to a preset control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Platformer controls to a preset
eventsFunctions.name: SetPreset

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: ObjectSpawner
description: Spawn objects periodically based on the location of the spawner.
If "random position" is enabled, objects will spawn in a random position inside the spawner object.
This allows the size of the spawner object to define an area that objects will spawn.
It can be used to create:
Note: Offset properties were deprecated in version 1.0.0.

eventsFunctions.description: Spawn (create) objects periodically. This action must be run every frame to work. When the max quantity is reached and an instance is deleted, the spawner waits the duration of the spawn period before creating another instance. Spawned objects are automatically linked to the spawner.
eventsFunctions.name: SpawnObject
eventsFunctions.sentence: Periodically spawn (create) a _PARAM2_ located at spawner _PARAM0_

events.comment: Check if max number of instances per spawner has been reached. Always spawn objects if quantity is set to "0"
Prevent objects from being spawned immediately after deleting an object while at max quantity alive
Check if max number of instances per spawner has been reached
Spawn an object when conditions are met. Spawned objects are linked to the spawner that made them
Legacy action that supports deprecated offsets
Move to a Random Position (if enabled)

eventsFunctions.description: Change the offset X relative to the center of spawner (in pixels).
eventsFunctions.name: SetOffsetX
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the offset X of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.description: Change the offset Y relative to the center of spawner (in pixels).
eventsFunctions.name: SetOffsetY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the offset Y of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.description: Change the spawn period (in seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: SetSpawnPeriod
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the spawn period of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: Return the offset X relative to the center of spawner (in pixels).
eventsFunctions.name: OffsetX

eventsFunctions.description: Return the offset Y relative to the center of spawner (in pixels).
eventsFunctions.name: OffsetY

eventsFunctions.description: Return the spawn period (in seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: SpawnPeriod

eventsFunctions.description: Restart the cooldown of a spawner.
eventsFunctions.name: ResetSpawnTimer

eventsFunctions.description: Return the remaining time before the next spawn (in seconds). Useful for triggering visual and sound effects.
eventsFunctions.name: TimeBeforeSpawn

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an object has just been created by this spawner. Useful for triggering visual and sound effects.
eventsFunctions.name: ObjectWasJustSpawned

eventsFunctions.description: the max objects in the scene (per spawner) of the object. Limits the number of objects in the scene that were created by this spawner. Set this to 0 for no limit.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Max objects in the scene (per spawner)
eventsFunctions.name: MaxQuantity
eventsFunctions.sentence: the max objects in the scene (per spawner)

eventsFunctions.description: Check if spawner has unlimited capacity.
eventsFunctions.name: UnlimitedObjectCapacity

eventsFunctions.description: Change unlimited capacity of spawner.
eventsFunctions.name: SetUnlimitedObjectCapacity

eventsFunctions.description: the number of objects that can be created by this spawner. This is reduced everytime an objects is spawned.
eventsFunctions.name: SpawnerCapacity

eventsFunctions.description: Check if using random positions. Useful for making large spawner areas.
eventsFunctions.name: RandomPosition

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) random positions. Useful for making large spawner areas.
eventsFunctions.name: SetRandomPosition

propertyDescriptors.label: Offset X (relative to position of spawner)
propertyDescriptors.name: OffsetX

propertyDescriptors.label: Offset Y (relative to position of spawner)
propertyDescriptors.name: OffsetY

propertyDescriptors.label: Max objects in the scene (per spawner)
propertyDescriptors.description: Limits the number of objects in the scene that were created by this spawner. Set this to 0 for no limit.
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxQuantity

propertyDescriptors.label: Spawner capacity
propertyDescriptors.description: Number of objects that can be created by this spawner. This is reduced everytime an objects is spawned.
propertyDescriptors.name: SpawnerCapacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Use random positions
propertyDescriptors.description: Objects will be created at a random position inside the spawner. Useful for making large spawner areas.
propertyDescriptors.name: RandomPosition

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian, Entropy, VegeTato
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Flash
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Make an object flash visibility (blink), color tint, object effect, or opacity (fade).
description: Make an object flash for a period of time so that it alternates between two different states.
Includes the ability to flash visibility (blink), color tint, object effect, or opacity (fade).
After adding a behavior to an object, you **trigger the effect** by using the **Flash action**.
- Let players know they are invincible after being hit
- Catch player attention on the interface (for instance a "press start" text)

eventsFunctions.description: Color tint applied to an object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Color tint applied to an object

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: SmoothCamera
eventsFunctionsExtensions.previewIconUrl: https://resources.gdevelop-app.com/assets/Icons/Line Hero Pack/Master/SVG/Computers and Hardware/Computers and Hardware_camcoder_gopro_go_pro_camera.svg
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Smoothly scroll to follow an object.
description: The camera follows an object according to:
- a frame rate independent catch-up speed to make the scrolling from smooth to strong
- a maximum speed to do linear following ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://platformer-with-tilemap)) or slow down the camera when teleporting the object
- a follow-free zone to avoid scrolling on small movements
- an offset to see further in one direction
- an extra delay and catch-up speed to give an impression of speed (useful for dash)
- position forecasting and delay to simulate a cameraman response time
A platformer dedicated behavior allows to switch of settings when the character is in air or on the floor. This can be used to stabilize the camera when jumping.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Smoothly scroll to follow an object.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: SmoothCamera

events.comment: Update private properties through setters to check their values and initialize state.

eventsFunctions.description: Move the camera closer to the object. This action must be called after the object has moved for the frame.
eventsFunctions.name: MoveCameraCloser

events.comment: The camera following is called with an action, the call from doStepPreEvents must be disabled to avoid to do it twice.

eventsFunctions.description: Move the camera closer to the object.
eventsFunctions.name: DoMoveCameraCloser

events.comment:
Delaying and forecasting can be used at the same time.
Forecasting only use the positions that are older than the one used for delaying.
The behavior uses a position history that is split in 2 arrays:
- one for delaying the position (from TimeFromStart to TimeFromStart - CamearDelay)
- one for forecasting the position (from TimeFromStart - CamearDelay to TimeFromStart - CamearDelay - ForecastHistoryDuration

At each frame, the camera must catchup the target by a given ratio (speed)
cameraX(t) - targetX = (cameraX(t - 1) - targetX) * speed

The frame rate must not impact on the catch-up speed, we don't want a speed in ratio per frame but a speed ratio per second, like this:
cameraX(t) - targetX = (cameraX(t - 1s) - targetX) * speed

Ok, but we still need to process each frame, we can use a exponent for this:
cameraX(t) - targetX = (cameraX(t - timeDelta) - targetX) * speed^timeDelta
cameraX(t) = targetX + (cameraX(t - timeDelta) - targetX) * exp(timeDelta * ln(speed))

pow is probably more efficient than precalculated log if the speed is changed continuously but this might be rare enough.

eventsFunctions.description: Delay the camera according to a maximum speed and catch up the delay.
eventsFunctions.name: WaitAndCatchUp
eventsFunctions.sentence: Delay the camera of _PARAM0_ during: _PARAM2_ seconds according to the maximum speed _PARAM3_;_PARAM4_ seconds and catch up in _PARAM5_ seconds

events.comment: Maybe the catch-up show be done in constant pixel speed instead of constant time speed.

eventsFunctions.description: Update delayed position and delayed history. This is called in doStepPreEvents.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateDelayedPosition
eventsFunctions.sentence: Update delayed position and delayed history of _PARAM0_

events.comment: Add the previous position to have enough (2) positions to evaluate the extra delay for waiting mode.
Use the object center when no delay is asked.
Remove history entries that are too old to be useful for delaying and pass it to the history for forecasting.
Don't move the camera if there is not enough history.

Add the extra delay that could be needed to respect the speed limit in waiting mode.

speedRatio = min(speedMaxX / historySpeedX, speedMaxY / historySpeedY)
delay += min(0, timeDelta * (1 - speedRatio))
The time with delay is now between the first 2 indexes

eventsFunctions.name: AddForecastHistoryPosition
eventsFunctions.sentence: Add the time:_PARAM2_ and position: _PARAM3_; _PARAM4_ to the forecast history of _PARAM0_

events.comment:
Remove history entries that are too old to be useful.
Keep at least 2 positions because no forecast can be done with less positions.

eventsFunctions.description: Update forecasted position. This is called in doStepPreEvents.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateForecastedPosition

events.comment:
Simple linear regression
y = A * x + B

A = Covariance / VarianceX
B = MeanY - A * MeanX

Note than we could use only one position every N positions to reduce the process time,
but if we really need efficient process JavaScript and circular queues are a must.

VarianceX = sum((X[i] - MeanX))
VarianceY = sum((Y[i] - MeanY))
Covariance = sum((X[i] - MeanX) * (Y[i] - MeanY))

y = A * x + B

A = Covariance / VarianceX
B = MeanY - A * MeanX
Axis permutation to avoid a ratio between 2 numbers near 0.

eventsFunctions.description: Project history ends position to have the vector on the line from linear regression. This function is only called by UpdateForecastedPosition.
eventsFunctions.name: ProjectHistoryEnds
eventsFunctions.sentence: Project history oldest: _PARAM2_;_PARAM3_ and newest position: _PARAM4_;_PARAM5_ of _PARAM0_

events.comment:
Perpendicular line:
pA = -1/a; 
pB = -pA * x + y

Intersection:
/ ProjectedY = a * ProjectedX + b
\ ProjectedY = pA * ProjectedX + b

Solution that is cleaned out from indeterminism (like 0 / 0 or infinity / infinity):
ProjectedX= (x + (y - b) * a) / (a + 1)
ProjectedY = y + (x * a - y + b) / (a + 1)

eventsFunctions.description: Return the ratio between forecast time and the duration of the history. This function is only called by UpdateForecastedPosition.
eventsFunctions.name: ForecastTimeRatio

events.comment: This allows to detect a change of "intial value" on hot reload.
Create the label over the bar.
Pass the configuration to the behavior.

Children instances must be resized when the parent size change:
- background is resized to take the full dimensions of the parent
- the bar size is refreshed according to the value
- the label is put back at the center of the bar

The scale is set back to 1 because it means that the parent instance has the same dimensions as the union of its children instances.

eventsFunctions.fullName: Health damage taken from most recent hit
eventsFunctions.name: PreviousDamageTaken
eventsFunctions.sentence: the health damage taken from most recent hit

eventsFunctions.description: the maximum shield points of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxShield

eventsFunctions.description: Change the maximum shield points of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxShield
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the maximum shield of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: Change maximum shield points.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxShieldPoints
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the maximum shield points on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: the current shield points of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: ShieldPoints

eventsFunctions.description: Change current shield points. Will not trigger damage cooldown.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldPoints
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change current shield points on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: the rate of shield regeneration (points per second).
eventsFunctions.name: ShieldRegenRate

eventsFunctions.description: Change rate of shield regeneration.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldRegenRate
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the shield regeneration rate of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points per second

eventsFunctions.description: the delay before shield regeneration starts after being hit (seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: ShieldRegenDelay

eventsFunctions.description: Change delay before shield regeneration starts after being hit.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldRegenDelay
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the shield regeneration delay on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: the duration of the shield (seconds). A value of "0" means the shield is permanent.
eventsFunctions.name: ShieldDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Change duration of shield. Use "0" to make shield permanent.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the duration of shield on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: Renew shield duration to it's full value.
eventsFunctions.name: RenewShieldDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Activate the shield by setting the shield points and renewing the shield duration (optional).
eventsFunctions.name: ActivateShield
eventsFunctions.sentence: Activate the shield on _PARAM0_ with _PARAM2_ points (Renew shield duration: _PARAM3_)

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) blocking excess damage when shield breaks.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Block excess damage when shield breaks
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldBlockExcessDamage
eventsFunctions.sentence: Shield on _PARAM0_ blocks excess damage when it breaks: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the shield was just damaged previously in the events.
eventsFunctions.name: IsShieldJustDamaged
eventsFunctions.sentence: Shield on _PARAM0_ has just been damaged

eventsFunctions.description: Check if incoming damage was just dodged.
eventsFunctions.name: IsJustDodged

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the shield is active (based on shield points and duration).
eventsFunctions.name: IsShieldActive

events.comment: To be considered "active", a shield must have positive points AND not exceed duration
Don't check the timer when duration is zero (or negative)

eventsFunctions.description: the time before the shield duration ends (seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: ShieldTimeRemaining
eventsFunctions.sentence: the time before the shield duration end

eventsFunctions.description: the shield damage taken from most recent hit.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Shield damage taken from most recent hit
eventsFunctions.name: PreviousDamageToShield
eventsFunctions.sentence: the shield damage taken from most recent hit

eventsFunctions.description: the health points gained from previous heal.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Health points gained from previous heal
eventsFunctions.name: PreviousHealAmount
eventsFunctions.sentence: the health points gained from previous heal

propertyDescriptors.label: Maximum health
propertyDescriptors.description: Use 0 for no maximum.
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxHealth

propertyDescriptors.label: Allow heals to increase health above max health (regen will never exceed max health)
propertyDescriptors.name: AllowOverHealing

propertyDescriptors.label: Damage to health from the previous incoming damage
propertyDescriptors.name: DamageToBeApplied

propertyDescriptors.label: Chance to dodge incoming damage (between 0 and 1)
propertyDescriptors.description: When a damage is dodged, no damage is applied.
propertyDescriptors.name: ChanceToDodge

propertyDescriptors.label: Health points gained from the previous heal
propertyDescriptors.name: HealToBeApplied

propertyDescriptors.label: Rate of health regeneration (points per second)
propertyDescriptors.name: HealthRegenRate

propertyDescriptors.label: Health regeneration delay
propertyDescriptors.description: Delay before health regeneration starts after a hit.
propertyDescriptors.name: HealthRegenDelay

propertyDescriptors.label: Maximum shield
propertyDescriptors.description: Leave 0 for unlimited.
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxShieldPoints

propertyDescriptors.label: Duration of shield
propertyDescriptors.description: Use 0 to make the shield permanent.
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldDuration

propertyDescriptors.label: Rate of shield regeneration (points per second)
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldRegenRate

propertyDescriptors.label: Block excess damage when shield is broken
propertyDescriptors.name: BlockExcessDamage

propertyDescriptors.label: Shield regeneration delay
propertyDescriptors.description: Delay before shield regeneration starts after a hit.
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldRegenDelay

propertyDescriptors.label: Damage to shield from the previous incoming damage
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldDamageTaken

propertyDescriptors.label: Flat damage reduction from armor
propertyDescriptors.description: Incoming damages are reduced by this value.
propertyDescriptors.name: FlatDamageReduction

propertyDescriptors.label: Percentage damage reduction from armor (between 0 and 1)
propertyDescriptors.name: PercentDamageReduction
